content: Your request under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) has been reviewed and the documents you requested have been posted on the OpenRecords portal

Your request under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) has been reviewed and is granted in part and denied in part because some of the records or portions of records are disclosable and others are exempt from disclosure under FOIL
Your request under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) has been fulfilled and the documents you requested have been emailed to you
Your request under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) has been fulfilled and the documents you requested have been faxed to you
Your request under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) has been been fulfilled and the documents you requested have been mailed to you. Please allow 7 - 10 days for receipt
Your request under the Freedom of Information Law has been fulfilled and the documents you requested are available to you for pickup
Your request under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) is denied because no responsive records were found
Your request under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) is denied because it is a request for information that is not contained in an existing agency record
Your request under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) is denied because the records you requested are exempt from disclosure under FOIL
Your request under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) cannot be processed because it does not provide enough information to identify the records you would like to receive

We need more information from you in order to process your request under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL). We have tried to contact you but have not received a response within the last 5 business days. We are closing this request due to lack of response. If you remain interested in these records, you may open a new FOIL request

The records you requested under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) could be provided to you at cost. We are closing this request because we have not received your payment to cover the record retrieval and/or duplication cost. If you still want a copy of these records, you may open a new FOIL request
Your request under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) is being closed because the records are publicly available
Your request under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) is being closed because the record is not a city record
Your request is for general City information or services. You may search http://nyc.gov/ or call 311 for assistance
Your request is for data that is available through the City's OpenData site. You may visit http://nyc.gov/opendata to find this information
Your request under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) is being closed because this agency does not have the records requested. You should direct your request to a different agency
Your request under the Freedom of Information Law (FOIL) is being closed because the document or information you requested is publicly available
